5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: Telah menceritakan kepada kami [Muhammad bin Mushaffa Al Himshi] berkata, telah menceritakan kepada kami [Baqiyyah] dari [Abdullah bin Waqid] dari [Muhammad bin 'Ajlan] dari [Amru bin Syu'aib] dari [Bapaknya] dari [Kakeknya] ia berkata, "Rasulullah shallallahu 'alaihi wasallam duduk ihtiba` di hari jum'at, yaitu ketika imam sedang berkhutbah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْحِلَقِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ قَبْلَ الصَّلاَةِ وَالاِحْتِبَاءِ وَالإِمَامُ يَخْطُبُ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning sitting in circles on Fridays before the Prayer, and Ihtiba’ when the Imam is delivering the sermon
